//package gametheory;

import java.util.Scanner;

/**
 *
 * @author PrudhviNIT
 */
public class Main {

    /**
     * @param args the command line arguments
     */
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        // TODO code application logic here
        Scanner obj = new Scanner(System.in);
        int T = obj.nextInt(),arr[];
        String starter,other,s;
        long xor;
        while(T-->0){
            starter = obj.next();
            other = "Tarun";
            if(starter.equals("Tarun")){
                other = "Varun";
            }
            s = obj.next();
            arr = new int[26];
            for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++){
                arr[s.charAt(i)-97]++;
            }
            xor  = 0;
            for(int i=0;i<26;i++){
                xor = xor^arr[i];
            }
            if(xor==0){
                System.out.println(other);
            }
            else{
                System.out.println(starter);
            }
        }
    }
}
